Entities

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Entities.Entity

  • public class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
    Entity is an object with it's position, rotation, scale and texture

        Parameters:
        model - texturedModel
        position - xyz position of an entity in the world

        rotY - rotation over y axis
        rotZ - rotation over z axis
        scale - scale of an entity object
